price: Solomon’s armies of jinn, men and birds were assembled before him, marching in organized ranks,
arabic: وَحُشِرَ لِسُلَيۡمَٰنَ جُنُودُهُۥ مِنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ وَٱلۡإِنسِ وَٱلطَّيۡرِ فَهُمۡ يُوزَعُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
